scripts.build: cd ../../../packages/html5-sdk/ && npm i --no-audit && rimraf node_modules/kinvey-js-sdk && npm run build
scripts.pretest: npm run symlink-js-sdk && npm run build-js-sdk && npm run build && node ../setup.js --target=html5 && node scripts/test.js
scripts.test: karma start karma.conf.js --browsers=ChromeHeadless_without_security || (npm run posttest && exit 1)
scripts.test-debug: npm run pretest && karma start karma.conf.js --browsers=Chrome_without_security --single-run=false; npm run posttest
